name: AboutMDSimulator
description: Preview Markdown files for your mods without recompiling them!

autoReloadInterval.name: Auto Reload Interval (in Seconds)
autoReloadInterval.description: Number of seconds before the preview updates again. Set to `9` to disable.

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
